text:
Difference between revisions of "Main Page/Previous Conservapedia Breaking News" From Conservapedia (archiving mid-February through March 2017) + '''[[President Trump]] signs [[Ted Cruz | Cruz]]-Brady bill''' to expand drug testing of [[unemployment]] benefit applicants. [http://www.dallasnews.com/news/politics/2017/03/31/trump-signs-cruz-brady-bill-expand-drug-testing-unemployment-benefit-applicants] + '''[[Conservapedia proven right]], again: [[Dems]] attain 43 votes to block [[Neil Gorsuch]] with a [[filibuster]]'''. [https://www.washingtonpost.com/powerpost/senate-panel-prepares-to-consider-gorsuch-as-threat-of-filibuster-looms/2017/04/03/129bcd8c-186a-11e7-bcc2-7d1a0973e7b2_story.html?utm_term=.ef2e796007f1] ''[[RINO]]s want to [[Senate rules change|change the Senate rules]] in order to confirm the [[pro-choice]] Gorsuch''. '''In [[Saudi Arabia]], high school ladies are being herded''' like cattle.[http://www.teapartycrusaders.com/watch-saudi-women-herded-like-cattle-by-fundamentalist/] + '''An audit of [[Department of Housing and Urban Development]] shows financial records have been so poorly kept''' that they are correcting $520 billion in bookkeeping errors. [http://epoliticsinfo.com/2017/04/02/dr-ben-carson-in-shock-after-huds-audit-uncovers-billions-of-dollars/] + '''[[Political correctness]] run amok''': “[[Swedish]] and [[Norwegian]] newspapers on Friday said they would refrain from the tradition of publishing [[April Fool's Day]] jokes this year over fears that it might spread '[[fake news]].'” [http://www.breitbart.com/london/2017/03/31/swedish-newspapers-ditch-april-fools-jokes-case-spread-fake-news/] + '''[[America]]ns never seem to learn from [[history]].''' ''This is especially true of certain crimes by the same elites we return to office year after year.'' [http://www.conservativenewsandviews.com/2017/03/31/clergy/history-tries-teach-america-learn/] + '''The [[RINO]] strategy of picking the stealth, [[pro-choice]] nominee [[Neil Gorsuch]] fails to pick up more than 2 [[Dems]]''', far short of the 8 to 9 Dem votes needed to defeat the upcoming [[filibuster]]. [http://thehill.com/homenews/senate/325515-the-hills-whip-list-where-dems-stand-on-trumps-supreme-court-nominee] ''Gorsuch should be replaced by a [[pro-life]] nominee who has broad support, as [[Sam Alito]] and [[Clarence Thomas]] did''. + "'''[[Trump]] goes after [[House Freedom Caucus|Freedom Caucus]] ringleaders" who blocked the "[[Obamacare]] Lite" bill'''. [http://www.politico.com/story/2017/03/trump-freedom-caucus-tweet-236724] ''[[Conservative]] [[Jim Jordan]] seems the most likely to break ranks and support Trump''. + '''About those surveys you get in the [[mail]]''' from [[Republican]]s and [[Democrat]]s: ''why do those surveys end up looking the same, even to the paper they print them on?'' [http://www.conservativenewsandviews.com/2017/03/30/constitution/tale-two-survey-party-con/] + '''Is [[health insurance]] really good for anyone?''' ''A founder and operator of several successful clinics for the less-well-off offers an alternative.'' [http://www.conservativenewsandviews.com/2017/03/29/family/health-insurance-good/] + '''Don't count [[Donald Trump]] out yet,''' whatever you're thinking. ''He's playing his enemies, as he did in [[real estate]].'' [http://www.conservativenewsandviews.com/2017/03/29/teaparty/trust-trump/] + '''Why is [[Neil Gorsuch]] a poor choice for the [[Supreme Court]]?''' ''Because he puts precedent on a par with the [[Constitution]] and above the [[God|Divine]] law of [[life]].'' [http://www.conservativenewsandviews.com/2017/03/29/constitution/neil-gorsuch-roe-v-wade/] '''A broad review of [[Trump]]'s dismantling''' of the [[progressive]] agenda. [http://www.conservativenewsandviews.com/2017/03/28/teaparty/progressives-devolving/] + '''[[Trump]] tosses out [[global warming]] orders by the [[Obama Administration]]'''. [http://thehill.com/policy/energy-environment/326124-trump-signs-order-to-roll-back-obamas-climate-moves] ''This gives [[coal]] miners a chance''. + '''Witches to cast spell on President [[Donald Trump]]''' - again![http://www.teapartycrusaders.com/witches-to-cast-spell-on-trump-again/] Evidently, they think [[Hillary Clinton]] is pro-witch! + '''Update on [[Unplug the NFL]]''': the Oakland Raiders leave the city with a $95 million debt, and skip town to fleece the taxpayers in [[Las Vegas]] for even more money. [http://www.usatoday.com/story/sports/nfl/2017/03/27/las-vegas-raiders-oakland-los-angeles-san-diego-st-louis-rams-chargers/99701878/] ''The [[NFL]] is corporate welfare for billionaires''. '''UPDATE''': taxpayer cost is $750M in Vegas hotel tax hike. + '''[[New York City]] and [[Chicago]] areas:''' Some parents threw a hissy fit after the school recently began enforcing a long-ignored state law requiring that public schools host a daily [[Pledge of Allegiance|pledge of allegiance]] to the flag.[http://www.teapartycrusaders.com/parents-mad-that-students-have-the-option-option-to-say-the-pledge-of-allegiance/] + '''[[Nebraska]] [[Democrat]] Party chairwoman Jane Kleeb''' posted a video to Facebook last week showing herself and her staff preparing a bunch of welcome baskets for incoming refugees - voter registration forms included.[http://www.teapartycrusaders.com/video-dem-party-includes-voter-registration-forms-in-refugee-welcome-baskets/] '''Over 21% of U.S prison inmates''' are not Americans.[http://www.teapartycrusaders.com/video-over-21-of-prison-inmates-are-not-citizens/] [[File:Tomi Lahren.jpg|100px|thumb|Tomi Lahren]] + '''Setback for [[liberal claptrap]]''': Tomi Lahren declared herself to be [[pro-choice]] and insisted it would somehow be hypocritical to favor limited government and be [[pro-life]], and then refused to apologize. Now she has been properly "banned permanently" from the [[conservative]] Blaze. [http://www.msn.com/en-us/entertainment/news/conservative-star-tomi-lahren-banned-permanently-from-the-blaze-report/ar-BByQKul] ''The only hypocrisy is abandoning the unborn''. + '''Rep. Ted Poe resigns from [[Koch brothers]]-dominated [[House Freedom Caucus]]''', which blocked the "[[ObamaCare]] Lite" bill on Friday. [http://www.koco.com/article/rep-poe-resigns-from-house-freedom-caucus-over-health-care-stance/9187546] + '''[[Liberal logic]]: after the RyanCare fiasco the [[RINO]] [[Reince Priebus]] declares that the [[GOP]] needs to "start governing."''' [http://www.foxnews.com/politics/2017/03/26/priebus-on-obamacare-overhaul-it-s-time-for-gop-to-start-governing.html] ''But hasn't that been Priebus's responsibility as [[Trump]]'s [[chief of staff]]?'' + '''[[Conservative]] Sen. [[Rand Paul]] was excluded by [[House]] [[RINO]]s from developing the "[[ObamaCare]] Lite" bill, and now Sen. Paul is considered the victor''' over [[Paul Ryan]] as it failed to pass. [http://thehill.com/blogs/floor-action/senate/325702-rand-paul-takes-victory-lap-on-gop-health-bill] + '''Ineffective [[House]] [[Speaker of the United States House of Representatives|Speaker]] [[Paul Ryan]] fails to find enough votes to pass his "[[ObamaCare]] Lite" bill'''. [http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-obamacare-idUSKBN16V149] ''Ryan should resign''. '''James Woods: What [[Democrats]] have''' done to the United States.[http://www.teapartycrusaders.com/james-woods-posts-tweet-showing-what-democrats-have-done-to-america/] '''Illegal alien involved''' in rape. Sign of sanctuary city problem.[http://www.teapartycrusaders.com/brutal-school-rape-in-maryland-is-symptom-of-a-sanctuary-nation/] '''[[ISIS]] takes responsibility for''' [[London]] attack.[http://www.teapartycrusaders.com/video-isis-releases-statement-claiming-responsibility-for-london-attack/] + '''Travis County Sheriff Sally Hernandez''' has refused to comply with Immigration and Customs Enforcement detainer requests. Texas Governor steps in.[http://www.teapartycrusaders.com/texas-governor-calls-out-travis-county-sheriff-announces-state-wide-sanctuary-city-ban/] '''[[Conservatives]] reject "[[ObamaCare]] Lite" bill'''; [[House]] delays vote. + '''[[Dems]] announce they will block with a [[filibuster]] the "I would walk out the door" [[Neil Gorsuch]], who smugly said he would have done that if the president had asked him to overturn ''[[Roe v. Wade]] . ''Time for Gorsuch to be replaced by a [[pro-life]] nominee''. '''[[U.S. Air Force]] bombs [[terrorist]] camps in [[Libya]]'''. [http://www.foxnews.com/world/2017/01/19/b-2-bombers-kill-nearly-100-isis-terrorists-in-libya.html?utm_source=zergnet.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=zergnet_1429912] + '''"[[Neil Gorsuch|Gorsuch]]: ‘I accept’ ''[[Roe v. Wade]]'' as the ‘[[law of the land]].’"''' [http://www.theblaze.com/news/2017/03/22/gorsuch-i-accept-roe-v-wade-as-the-law-of-the-land/] ''[[Dems]] succeed in eroding the [[pro-life]] base of [[Trump]] and the [[Republican Party]], proving that Trump's advisers violated his pro-life pledge''. + '''Has US District [[Judge]] Derrick Watson committed [[treason]]?''' ''His ruling against the travel pause violates not only US law but also the [[Constitution]] itself. If, moreover, one can show it gives aid and comfort to enemies of the [[United States]], that is tantamount to treason.'' [http://www.conservativenewsandviews.com/2017/03/22/accountability/judicial/prosecute-hawaii-judge-treason/] + '''[[Neil Gorsuch]] defiantly thumbs his nose at [[pro-lifers]]''': "When [[U.S. Supreme Court|Supreme Court]] Justice nominee Judge Neil Gorsuch was asked what he would do if President [[Trump]] asked him to overturn ''[[Roe v. Wade]]'', he said he would walk out the door ." [http://www.cnn.com/videos/politics/2017/03/21/gorsuch-walked-out-the-door-trump-sot.cnn/video/playlists/judge-neil-gorsuch/] + Tomi Lahren claimed to be a "[[United States Constitution|constitution]]al [[conservative]]," and was a rising pro-[[Trump]] star at the Blaze. Then she declared she's [[pro-choice]] -- contrary to Trump's campaign pledge -- and she might want to start looking for a new career with people who do not care about the [[unborn]]. ''[[Glenn Beck]] has apparently suspended her show.'' + '''[[FBI]] devotes government resources to searching for a jersey of [[Tom Brady]] in [[Mexico]], and the [[lamestream media]] won't even criticize the FBI for the waste'''. [http://sports.yahoo.com/news/report-fbi-nfl-recover-tom-bradys-missing-super-bowl-jersey-130148110.html] ''[[Unplug the NFL]] to end its government subsidies, which are at least $1 billion annually''. + '''More nonsense resulting from [[liberal logic]]: "[[Transgender]] Wins International Women’s Weightlifting Title,"''' as the male-turned-female breaks four national women's records. [http://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2017/03/transgender-wins-international-womens-weightlifting-title/] + '''[[Trump]] delivers on another campaign pledge''': he successfully blocks so-called "[[free trade]]" proposals at the [[G-20]] meeting. [https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/economy/new-rifts-emerge-as-trump-rejects-free-trade-statement-at-g20-meeting/2017/03/18/aa69b1a2-0bf3-11e7-a15f-a58d4a988474_story.html?utm_term=.4740867e2cfe] + "'''Draining the Swamp''': [[Health and Human Services]] Cuts: Decrease Budgets, Increase [[Efficiency]] ." [http://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2017/03/trumps-budget-health-human-services-cuts-decrease-budgets-increase-efficiency%E2%80%A8/] + '''A [[liberal]] [[college]] [[professor]] creates a list of [[news]] outlets''' she does not like. ''The real problem: the [[Mainstream Media]] are the real ones putting out "[[fake news]]." [http://www.conservativenewsandviews.com/2017/03/17/accountability/news-media/loony-professor-desperate-state-media/] + '''Memo to [[Judge]] Watson in [[Hawaii]]:''' ''The [[Constitution of the United States]] does not protect the world.'' [http://www.conservativenewsandviews.com/2017/03/17/constitution/constitution-protect-america-world/] + "How POLITICO Became [[Hillary]]’s (Anti-[[United States Constitution|Constitution]], Anti-Journalism, Anti-[[Conservative]]) Lap Dog." [http://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2017/03/politico-became-hillarys-anti-constitution-anti-journalism-anti-conservative-lap-dog/] "Record [[Immigration]] Transforming [[America]]ns’ [[public school|School Districts]]." [http://www.breitbart.com/big-government/2017/03/16/report-record-immigration-transforming-americans-school-districts/] + '''[[Trump]]'s press secretary Sean Spicer tells the [[CNN]] reporter: "You’ve come to serious conclusions for a guy who has zero intelligence!"''' ''Spicer then softened it up by saying he was referring to the reporter's lack of a security clearance.'' [http://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2017/03/sean-spicer-destroys-cnns-jim-acosta-wiretapping-zero-intelligence-video/] + '''The massive line to attend [[Trump]]'s rally in [[Nashville]] on Wednesday was nearly two miles long'''. [http://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2017/03/line-see-president-trump-mile-long-nashville-tn-photos/ Photos] "'''[[Trump]] Blasts Court's Travel Ban Block''': 'This Ruling Makes Us Look Weak.'" [http://www.npr.org/2017/03/15/520342737/trump-blasts-courts-travel-ban-block-this-ruling-makes-us-look-weak] + '''[[Mainstream media]] bias turns especially ugly:''' ''they won't cover a community when [[tornado]]es devastate it because its residents are of the "wrong [[demographic]]."'' [http://www.conservativenewsandviews.com/2017/03/15/accountability/news-media/tornadoes-victims-wrong-demographic/] + '''The [[liberal media]] jumps on Rep. [[Steve King]] for saying "the birth rates in especially [[Western Europe]] ... all of [[Western civilization]], have gone down below the replacement rate"''' and urging higher birth rates rather than being "replaced by people who do not share our values." [http://www.realclearpolitics.com/video/2017/03/14/tucker_carlson_to_steve_king_everything_you_said_i_think_is_defensible_and_probably_right.html] + '''[[Al Gore]]'s latest [[liberal]] bluster''': “We’re seeing every night on the television news now a nature hike through the [[Book of Revelation]].” [http://www.breitbart.com/video/2017/03/13/al-gore-every-night-on-the-news-were-seeing-a-nature-hike-through-the-book-of-revelation/] + '''Advice to [[Donald Trump]]: drain the swamp in government.''' Among other pieces of advice: ''put obstreperous [[civil service system|civil service]] personnel in "rubber rooms" where they can do no further damage.'' [http://www.conservativenewsandviews.com/2017/03/13/editorial/guest/swamp-creatures-expose-selves/] + '''[[Sarah Palin]] blasts [[Paul Ryan]]''''s [[RINO]]-CARE.[http://www.teapartycrusaders.com/audio-sarah-palin-on-paul-ryans-rino-care-socialized-medicine-president-trump-will-step-in-and-fix-it/] RINO-CARE has a "“continuous coverage” surcharge rather than eliminate [[ObamaCare]]'s individual mandate.[http://www.politico.com/story/2017/03/paul-ryan-individual-mandate-health-care-235803] + '''The [[Iraq]]i army finally succeeded''' to push into west Mosul after initial setbacks in the offensive against [[ISIS]] earlier this week.[http://www.teapartycrusaders.com/video-isis-tries-to-offset-the-imminent-loss-of-its-caliphate-in-iraq-and-east-syria/] + '''[[Liberal logic]]: [[Donald Trump]] won big while [[RINO]] [[John McCain]] lost his attempt at the presidency'''. Yet McCain thinks he can order Trump to retract or clarify his wiretap claim, and the [[lamestream media]] cheers McCain on. [http://www.cnn.com/2017/03/12/politics/john-mccain-donald-trump/] + '''"The [[Republican]] and [[Democratic]] parties are 'disintegrating before our very eyes,' [[Ohio]] Gov. [[John Kasich]] said Sunday."''' [http://www.politico.com/story/2017/03/kasich-political-parties-are-disintegrating-235974] ''Translation of the [[RINO]]'s analysis: [[Washington, D.C.|D.C.]], you're not fooling anyone anymore''. + '''YOU'RE FIRED, GET OUT''': "After refusing yesterday's request to resign, the [[United States Attorney|U.S. Attorney]] for [[Manhattan]] was just fired by the [[Trump Administration|Trump administration]]." [https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/national-security/new-york-federal-prosecutor-preet-bharara-has-not-submitted-resignation/2017/03/11/39163292-067a-11e7-ad5b-d22680e18d10_story.html?utm_t.erm=.1e306cae93a6] + '''[[Barack Obama]] has a team''' of 12 people to keep tabs on President [[Donald Trump]]. [http://www.teapartycrusaders.com/obama-has-over-12-people-in-a-d-c-office-to-keep-tabs-on-trump/] + '''Another reason [[Trump]] must clean house at the [[FBI]]:''' ''they selectively prosecute the enemies of [[Islam]] when they should be investigating Islam as a dangerously subversive movement.'' [http://www.conservativenewsandviews.com/2017/03/10/accountability/executive/fbi-selective-prosecution/] + '''[[Trump]] cleans house, eradicates holdovers from the [[Obama Administration]]''': "[[Jeff Sessions]] asks 46 [[Obama]]-appointed [[United States Attorney|U.S. attorney]]s to resign." [http://www.latimes.com/politics/washington/la-na-essential-washington-updates-jeff-sessions-asks-46-obama-era-u-s-1489181229-htmlstory.html] + '''The political pendulum is swinging towards [[right-wing]] politics in''' [[Europe]]/[[France]]: "[[Marine Le Pen]] is enjoying spectacular and excited [[Trump]]-like crowds in [[France]]." [http://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2017/03/amazing-marine-le-pen-enjoys-spectacular-trump-like-crowd-france-video/] + '''[[Trump]]'s [[EPA]] chief Scott Pruitt questions the [[global warming]] hoax''', and the [[lamestream media]] responds with a torrent of [[fake news]] about non-existent "scientific consensus." [https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/energy-environment/wp/2017/03/09/on-climate-change-scott-pruitt-contradicts-the-epas-own-website/?utm_term=.8cbd1bb8eb02] ''Many scientists doubt the global warming alarmists also''. + '''[[Melania Trump]] rejects [[feminist]] ideology: she wore black rather than the solidarity red on International Women's Day''', and her remarks emphasized equal ''opportunity'' rather than the mindless equality of the [[communism]] that she grew up under. ''Her popularity has soared''. [http://www.sandiegouniontribune.com/opinion/the-conversation/sd-melania-favorability-up-since-inauguration-20170308-htmlstory.html] + '''[[Michael Reagan]] has come out swinging''' at his brother [[Ron Reagan]], CNN and MSNBC for a controversial TV ad that promotes [[atheism]].[http://www.newsmax.com/Newsfront/michael-reagan-ron-reagan-freedom-from-religion-foundation-atheism/2017/03/03/id/776721/] See also: [[Essay: 10 problems for atheists|10 problems for atheists]]. + '''The [[Federal Reserve]] goes against everything the Framers of the [[Constitution]]''' stood for. ''From [[George Washington]] to [[Thomas Jefferson]] to [[Abraham Lincoln]] to [[James A. Garfield]] to [[John F. Kennedy]], [[President]]s of the United States have tried to regain sound [[money]].'' [http://www.conservativenewsandviews.com/2017/03/08/money/money-money-money/] + '''The has-been [[British]] [[House of Lords]] comes out of the woodwork for its biggest turnout since 1831 to try to hold onto power after [[Brexit]] repudiated ceding sovereignty to the [[EU]].''' [http://www.bbc.com/news/uk-politics-39200658] ''Where was the same House of Lords when British sovereignty was being given way?'' + '''[[Google]] is manipulating search results and selectively applying anti-[[spam]] rules''' to the disadvantage of [[conservative]] users. ''Tests nail them to the wall dead-to-rights.'' [http://www.conservativenewsandviews.com/2017/03/07/accountability/news-media/google-destroy-free-speech/] + [[Claire McCaskill]], the [[Democrat]]ic senator up for reelection who is one of the harshest critics of [[Attorney General]] [[Jeff Sessions]] over his meetings with a Russian ambassador, has been confronted with her own tweets contradicting her claim that she never had met the ambassador. [http://www.usatoday.com/story/news/politics/2017/03/02/mccaskill-accused-lying-attack-sessions/98630572/] + '''[[Liberal style]]: [[Arnold Schwarzenegger]] refused to support [[Trump]] and now says it is Trump's fault that Schwarzenegger had such awful ratings on ''The Apprentice , as he announces he's quitting the show. [http://www.thehill.com/blogs/in-the-know/in-the-know/322221-schwarzenegger-done-on-apprentice-cites-trump] + '''The [[Anti-Defamation League]] now supports defamation''' in the name of [[globalism]], in their latest workshop for public ''and private'' schools. [http://www.conservativenewsandviews.com/2017/03/03/education/global-outreach-gambit/] + '''"Sen. [[Rand Paul]] (R-Ky.) on Thursday blasted [[House]] [[Republican]] leaders for keeping their [[ObamaCare]] repeal and replace legislation under wraps'''. ''Senator Paul was not allowed into a room holding the House Obamacare appeal bill''." [http://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2017/03/video-senator-rand-paul-not-allowed-room-read-gop-healthcare-bill/] + '''[[Trump]]'s television audience for his speech to [[Congress]] was 10 million more than those who watched the [[liberal]] Academy Awards'''. [http://www.thehill.com/homenews/administration/321850-trump-draws-audience-of-43m-for-speech] ''The Oscars would do better if they were more [[conservative]]''. + '''[[Liberal logic]]''': Former [[Kentucky]] Governor Steve Beshear criticizes [[Trump]]'s speech and defends [[Obamacare]] by saying the following, '''“I’m a proud [[Democrat]]. But first and foremost I’m a proud [[Republican]].”''' [http://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2017/03/oops-democrat-response-trump-former-governor-calls-proud-republican-video/] + '''[[Donald Trump]] has instituted a sort of “open-door policy”''' for the [[Oval Office]], permitting more than a dozen of his aides and assistants to have virtually unfettered access to speak with him.[http://www.teapartycrusaders.com/trump-makes-unheard-of-change-to-oval-office-access-declares-open-door-policy-elites-will-hate/] + [[Barack Obama]] had a much more restricted and regimented control in terms of access to the Oval Office. + '''An [[Arkansas]] state lawmaker''' has introduced a bill that would force the Bill and [[Hillary Clinton]] National Airport in Little Rock to be renamed after someone else.[http://www.teapartycrusaders.com/arkansas-lawmaker-wants-clinton-name-purged-from-city-airport/] + '''The [[Starbucks]] Coffee brand has''' taken a major hit since the company’s announcement that it would hire 10,000 [[Islam|Muslim]] “refugees” in response to President Donald Trump’s temporary travel moratorium in January.[http://www.teapartycrusaders.com/starbucks-brand-crashes-after-announcement-of-plan-to-hire-10000-muslim-refugees/] + '''[[Trump]] says this about [[Nancy Pelosi]]: “I Think She’s Incompetent ... She’s Done a Terrible Job.”''' [http://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2017/02/potus-trump-minority-leader-pelosi-think-shes-incompetent-shes-done-terrible-job-video/] ''Refreshing, isn't it?'' + '''[[Liberal claptrap]] strikes out again''': "Oscars draw lowest [[U.S.]] audience since 2008 with 32.9 million viewers." [http://www.reuters.com/article/us-awards-oscars-ratings-idUSKBN1661QH] ''Guess who hosted it in 2008, drawing even fewer viewers: [[Jon Stewart]]''. + '''"President [[Trump]]: [[Oscar]]s ‘Were Focused so Hard on [[Politics]]’ They Could Not Get the Basics of the Ceremony Right."''' [http://www.breitbart.com/big-government/2017/02/27/exclusive-president-trump-oscar-fail-focused-hard-politics-not-get-basics-right/] “I’ve been to the Oscars. There was something very special missing, and then to end that way was sad,” Trump added. '''How civil asset [[forfeiture]] violates the [[Constitution]],''' and how to stop the practice. + '''[[Hollywood values]]: [[Oscar]]s declare the wrong winner of Best Picture after spending much of the broadcast on tedious''', not-even-funny jokes against [[Trump]]. [http://ew.com/awards/2017/02/27/oscars-2017-ew-review/] + '''[[Liberal logic]]: "[[Transgender]] boy wins high school girls' [[wrestling]] tournament,"''' completes an undefeated 56-0 record. [http://www.foxnews.com/us/2017/02/26/transgender-boy-wins-high-school-girls-wrestling-tournament.html] + '''"[[CPAC]] 2017: Terribly Attended In The Wake Of #NeverTrump Split."''' Except for a few presentations, CPAC "primarily involved the same slew of #NeverTrump [[conservatives]]." [http://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2017/02/cpac-2017-terribly-attended-wake-nevertrump-split/] + '''A harsh reminder on how some [[America]]ns actually honor [[abortion]]''' with the votes they cast, in or out of the [[legislature]]. [http://www.conservativenewsandviews.com/2017/02/24/editorial/uncategorized/americans-honor-abortion/] "'''[[Trump|TRUMP]] Hits Dishonest [[liberal Media|Media]]''' in Opening Remarks at [[CPAC]] 2017." [http://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2017/02/potus-trump-hits-dishonest-media-opening-remarks-cpac-2017-video/] + '''The [[debate]] on building a wall is not new.''' ''In fact a similar dispute played out thousands of years ago. See [[Nehemiah]] for details.'' [http://www.conservativenewsandviews.com/2017/02/22/editorial/sanballat-lives/] + '''It's the [[liberal media|media]]'s job to control what people think''' says [[MSNBC]] host Mika Brzezinski.
